title: 3 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom apartment
posting_body: Gigantic apartment available in a Big Gay House!
Funky but lovable second floor apartment in Dorchester near Franklin Park, JP, and Roxbury.
2000sq ft, three bedroom one full bath, one half bath, receiving room, dining room, living room, den, kitchen and butler's pantry.
Shared front deck and private back deck, large shared yard with patio, and two blocks from Franklin Park!
Free, shared laundry in basement (HE washer and dryer installed in 2020).
One block from the 22, 44, and 29 bus stops.
Available September 1st but move-in date is a little flexible.
Water included, all other utilities payed by tenant(s).
